mapper.select:

accounting.MemberId accounting_memberId, accounting.AvailableAmount accounting_availableAmount, accounting.FrozenAmount accounting_frozenAmount, accounting.FreeChargeAmount accounting_freeChargeAmount bankCardChangeApply_city, bankCardChangeApply.IsValid bankCardChangeApply_isValid, bankCardChangeApply.IsSafeCard bankCardChangeApply_isSafeCard, bankCardChangeApply.ApplyTime bankCardChangeApply_applyTime appointment.Id appointment_id, appointment.MemberId appointment_memberId, appointment.SpvId appointment_spvId, appointment.ProductId appointment_productId, appointment.Contact appointment_contact, appointment.MobilePhone appointment_mobilePhone, appointment.ProductName appointment_productName, appointment.ProductCode appointment_productCode, appointment.AppointAmount appointment_appointAmount, appointment.Shares appointment_shares, appointment.AppointTime appointment_appointTime, appointment.Status appointment_status, appointment.Remark appointment_remark spvProductReturnMoney.Id spvProductReturnMoney_id, spvProductReturnMoney.MemberId spvProductReturnMoney_memberId, spvProductReturnMoney.SpvId spvProductReturnMoney_spvId, spvProductReturnMoney.ProductId spvProductReturnMoney_productId, spvProductReturnMoney.TransactionNumber spvProductReturnMoney_transactionNumber, spvProductReturnMoney.PayPlantformNumber spvProductReturnMoney_payPlantformNumber, spvProductReturnMoney.ProductName spvProductReturnMoney_productName, spvProductReturnMoney.ProductCode spvProductReturnMoney_productCode, spvProductReturnMoney.DistributePrincipal spvProductReturnMoney_distributePrincipal, spvProductReturnMoney.DistributeInterest spvProductReturnMoney_distributeInterest, spvProductReturnMoney.DistributeAmount spvProductReturnMoney_distributeAmount, spvProductReturnMoney.InterestRateDate spvProductReturnMoney_interestRateDate, spvProductReturnMoney.PaymentDate spvProductReturnMoney_paymentDate, spvProductReturnMoney.ActualExpirationDate spvProductReturnMoney_actualExpirationDate, spvProductReturnMoney.ExpectedProfitRatio spvProductReturnMoney_expectedProfitRatio, spvProductReturnMoney.ActualProfitRatio spvProductReturnMoney_actualProfitRatio, spvProductReturnMoney.SpvServiceFee spvProductReturnMoney_spvServiceFee, spvProductReturnMoney.SpvServiceFeeRatio spvProductReturnMoney_spvServiceFeeRatio, spvProductReturnMoney.BusinessCheckStatus spvProductReturnMoney_businessCheckStatus, spvProductReturnMoney.CheckingTime spvProductReturnMoney_checkingTime, spvProductReturnMoney.CheckingStatus spvProductReturnMoney_checkingStatus, spvProductReturnMoney.IntoObjectStatus spvProductReturnMoney_intoObjectStatus, spvProductReturnMoney.IntoObjectTime spvProductReturnMoney_intoObjectTime, spvProductReturnMoney.Remark spvProductReturnMoney_remark from CC_Member member inner join EB_BudgetBasicInfo budgetBasicInfo on budgetBasicInfo.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_RealnameAuthenticate realnameAuthenticate on realnameAuthenticate.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_LoginRecord loginRecord on loginRecord.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_MemberChild memberChild on memberChild.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_Feedback feedback on feedback.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_AccountingStatistics accountingStatistics on accountingStatistics.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_QuestionAnswer questionAnswer on questionAnswer.Id=member.Id inner join TC_AccountingDetail accountingDetail on accountingDetail.MemberId=member.Id inner join TC_ProductAmountLock productAmountLock on productAmountLock.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_BankCardBinding bankCardBinding on bankCardBinding.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_Accounting accounting on accounting.MemberId=member.Id inner join TC_WithdrawCashRecords withdrawCashRecords on withdrawCashRecords.MemberId=member.Id inner join TC_RechargeRecords rechargeRecords on rechargeRecords.MemberId=member.Id inner join CC_BankCardChangeApply bankCardChangeApply on bankCardChangeApply.MemberId=member.Id inner join TC_Appointment appointment on appointment.MemberId=member.Id inner join TC_SpvProductReturnMoney spvProductReturnMoney on spvProductReturnMoney.MemberId=member.Id
and Id=${id} and SpvId=${spvId} and EmailRegisterValidId=${emailRegisterValidId} and Type=${type} and Code=#{code} and Account=#{account} and PhoneAccount=#{phoneAccount} and EmailAccount=#{emailAccount} and Password=#{password} and UmpayUserNo=#{umpayUserNo} and UmpayAccountNo=#{umpayAccountNo} and PayPassword=#{payPassword} and Nickname=#{nickname} and Avatar=#{avatar} and ValidEmail=#{validEmail} and MobilePhone=#{mobilePhone} and OfficePhone=#{officePhone} and CertificateType=${certificateType} and CertificateNo=#{certificateNo} and Name=#{name} and Male=${male} and Birthday=#{birthday} and FamilyRole=${familyRole} and Rrac=${rrac} and RiskScore=${riskScore} and ProvinceSpell=#{provinceSpell} and ProvinceCode=${provinceCode} and CityCode=${cityCode} and CountryCode=${countryCode} and ProvinceName=#{provinceName} and CityName=#{cityName} and CountryName=#{countryName} and Address=#{address} and Income=${income} and Job=${job} and Education=${education} and ChildrenCount=${childrenCount} and IsFreePassword=${isFreePassword} and IsEmailValid=${isEmailValid} and IsRealname=${isRealname} and IsActivate=${isActivate} and IsOpenAccount=${isOpenAccount} and IsBindingCard=${isBindingCard} and IsSignature=${isSignature} and SignatureTime=#{signatureTime} and OpenAccountTime=#{openAccountTime} and RegisterTime=#{registerTime} and ModifyTime=#{modifyTime} and SerialNo=#{serialNo} and ResetTime=${resetTime} and ReferralCode=#{referralCode} and RecommendIdcode=#{recommendIdcode}

select Id member_id, SpvId member_spvId, EmailRegisterValidId member_emailRegisterValidId, Type member_type, Code member_code, Account member_account, PhoneAccount member_phoneAccount, EmailAccount member_emailAccount, Password member_password, UmpayUserNo member_umpayUserNo, UmpayAccountNo member_umpayAccountNo, PayPassword member_payPassword, Nickname member_nickname, Avatar member_avatar, ValidEmail member_validEmail, MobilePhone member_mobilePhone, OfficePhone member_officePhone, CertificateType member_certificateType, CertificateNo member_certificateNo, Name member_name, Male member_male, Birthday member_birthday, FamilyRole member_familyRole, Rrac member_rrac, RiskScore member_riskScore, ProvinceSpell member_provinceSpell, ProvinceCode member_provinceCode, CityCode member_cityCode, CountryCode member_countryCode, ProvinceName member_provinceName, CityName member_cityName, CountryName member_countryName, Address member_address, Income member_income, Job member_job, Education member_education, ChildrenCount member_childrenCount, IsFreePassword member_isFreePassword, IsEmailValid member_isEmailValid, IsRealname member_isRealname, IsActivate member_isActivate, IsOpenAccount member_isOpenAccount, IsBindingCard member_isBindingCard, IsSignature member_isSignature, SignatureTime member_signatureTime, OpenAccountTime member_openAccountTime, RegisterTime member_registerTime, ModifyTime member_modifyTime, SerialNo member_serialNo, ResetTime member_resetTime, ReferralCode member_referralCode, RecommendIdcode member_recommendIdcode from CC_Member

select Id member_id, SpvId member_spvId, EmailRegisterValidId member_emailRegisterValidId, Type member_type, Code member_code, Account member_account, PhoneAccount member_phoneAccount, EmailAccount member_emailAccount, Password member_password, UmpayUserNo member_umpayUserNo, UmpayAccountNo member_umpayAccountNo, PayPassword member_payPassword, Nickname member_nickname, Avatar member_avatar, ValidEmail member_validEmail, MobilePhone member_mobilePhone, OfficePhone member_officePhone, CertificateType member_certificateType, CertificateNo member_certificateNo, Name member_name, Male member_male, Birthday member_birthday, FamilyRole member_familyRole, Rrac member_rrac, RiskScore member_riskScore, ProvinceSpell member_provinceSpell, ProvinceCode member_provinceCode, CityCode member_cityCode, CountryCode member_countryCode, ProvinceName member_provinceName, CityName member_cityName, CountryName member_countryName, Address member_address, Income member_income, Job member_job, Education member_education, ChildrenCount member_childrenCount, IsFreePassword member_isFreePassword, IsEmailValid member_isEmailValid, IsRealname member_isRealname, IsActivate member_isActivate, IsOpenAccount member_isOpenAccount, IsBindingCard member_isBindingCard, IsSignature member_isSignature, SignatureTime member_signatureTime, OpenAccountTime member_openAccountTime, RegisterTime member_registerTime, ModifyTime member_modifyTime, SerialNo member_serialNo, ResetTime member_resetTime, ReferralCode member_referralCode, RecommendIdcode member_recommendIdcode from CC_Member where Id=${id}

select Id member_id, SpvId member_spvId, EmailRegisterValidId member_emailRegisterValidId, Type member_type, Code member_code, Account member_account, PhoneAccount member_phoneAccount, EmailAccount member_emailAccount, Password member_password, UmpayUserNo member_umpayUserNo, UmpayAccountNo member_umpayAccountNo, PayPassword member_payPassword, Nickname member_nickname, Avatar member_avatar, ValidEmail member_validEmail, MobilePhone member_mobilePhone, OfficePhone member_officePhone, CertificateType member_certificateType, CertificateNo member_certificateNo, Name member_name, Male member_male, Birthday member_birthday, FamilyRole member_familyRole, Rrac member_rrac, RiskScore member_riskScore, ProvinceSpell member_provinceSpell, ProvinceCode member_provinceCode, CityCode member_cityCode, CountryCode member_countryCode, ProvinceName member_provinceName, CityName member_cityName, CountryName member_countryName, Address member_address, Income member_income, Job member_job, Education member_education, ChildrenCount member_childrenCount, IsFreePassword member_isFreePassword, IsEmailValid member_isEmailValid, IsRealname member_isRealname, IsActivate member_isActivate, IsOpenAccount member_isOpenAccount, IsBindingCard member_isBindingCard, IsSignature member_isSignature, SignatureTime member_signatureTime, OpenAccountTime member_openAccountTime, RegisterTime member_registerTime, ModifyTime member_modifyTime, SerialNo member_serialNo, ResetTime member_resetTime, ReferralCode member_referralCode, RecommendIdcode member_recommendIdcode from CC_Member order by Id asc limit ${start},${offset}
